text: The 1958–59 FAW Welsh Cup is the 72nd season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. ==Key== League name pointed after clubs name. *B&DL; \- Birmingham & District League *FL D2 - Football League Second Division *FL D3 - Football League Third Division *FL D4 - Football League Fourth Division *SFL - Southern Football League ==Fifth round== Ten winners from the Fourth round and six new clubs. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D4)||1–4||Rhyl (CCL) |} ==Sixth round== ==Semifinal== Bangor City and Lovell's Athletic played at Wrexham, replay at Newtown; Cardiff City and Wrexham played at Shrewsbury. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Bangor City (SFL)||0–0||Lovell's Athletic (WLS D1) |- |replay||Bangor City (SFL||1–2||Lovell's Athletic (WLS D1) |- |2||Cardiff City (FL D2)||6–0||Wrexham (FL D3) |} ==Final== Final were held at Newport. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Cardiff City (FL D2)||2–0||Lovell's Athletic (WLS D1) |} ==External links== *The FAW Welsh Cup 1958-59 Wales Cup
title: 1958–59 Welsh Cup
